original_text: Jesus made the bad spirit go out of the man and leave him. Then the man began to speak again. Everybody there was very surprised. They said, ‘Nobody has seen anything like this happen in Israel before.’
korean_text: 귀신이 쫓겨나고 말 못하는 사람이 말하거늘 무리가 놀랍게 여겨 이르되 이스라엘 가운데서 이런 일을 본 적이 없다 하되

sentences.original_text: Jesus made the bad spirit go out
of the man and leave him
Then the man began to speak again
sentences.korean_translation: 그러자 그 사람이 다시 말하기 시작했습니다
거기 있던 모든 사람들이 매우 놀랐습니다

sentences.original_text: Nobody has seen anything like this happen
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 이런 일이 일어나는 것을 본 적이 없습니다
